actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against income tax to elementary and secondary public school teachers.
short_title: Teacher Recruitment and Retention Act of 2000

summary.text: Teacher Recruitment and Retention Act of 2000 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a $1,500 tax credit to elementary and secondary public school teachers.

titles.title: Teacher Recruitment and Retention Act of 2000
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against income tax to elementary and secondary public school teachers.
